Articles.Content: Everytime I play my game it seems normal. When I start playing on the game it lags ALOT and the lag is overkill, Crashes a lot, and I cant find the problem. Help..?
This belongs in Support. Also, can you be a little more specific?

Yeah, this definitely belongs to support. However, I'll see what I can contribute assistance wise. Have you checked through the Task Manager if you're running Windows to make sure you're not running out of memory or CPU usage being 100%?
Are you running on a Mac OSX 10.10? There are many lag issues with the OS right now.
what mods do you have installed if any?

Are you running on a Mac OSX 10.10? There are many lag issues with the OS right now.

I'm not the OP but that is good to know, I just thought my computer was getting processor damage from playing ksp on it :/

Fortunately the mac isn't my primary computer.

Get a mac they said, Mac is so much better than pc they said...

My 5 yr old gaming pc will do circles around my imac that is only 2 years old.

Any news on a fix then?

Edited April 25, 2015 by wolfedg

Moved (provisionally) to Support (modded installs) and thread title edited for clarity. Read the [thread=92229]How to Get Support[/thread] sticky and provide your output_log.txt and mod list (including versions).

I'm not the OP but that is good to know, I just thought my computer was getting processor damage from playing ksp on it :/

Fortunately the mac isn't my primary computer.

Get a mac they said, Mac is so much better than pc they said...

My 5 yr old gaming pc will do circles around my imac that is only 2 years old.

Any news on a fix then?

Fix has been out for ages.

Take the Mac and toss it in the garbage.
